itunes:title: Episode #3. The Death of Stephen Smith Case...Reopened
itunes:author: Matt Harris and Seton Tucker
itunes:subtitle:
Stephen Smith was the victim of a hit and run in 2015. The case was suddenly reopened by law enforcement this week. Seton has been in contact with Stephen Smith's mother for over a year. We discuss the very controversial case, and let you know how the Murdaugh boys are connected. #Murdaugh #Murdaughmurders #truecrime #stephensmith
